description: <p>The Clinic Oakleigh Road Health Centre are looking for an experienced part time receptionist to join our friendly team. Previous experience within a GP practice essential. Applicants must be able to demonstrate excellent I.T. skills and strong communication skills with an ability to pay attention to detail. They must also be able to adapt easily to changes within the NHS and cope with the high level of demand of working on a busy reception desk.</p>
title: Receptionist
